content.p: We are a leading centre for research in French and Francophone Studies; German Studies; Russian and Slavonic Studies, including Serbian/Croatian; Spanish, Portuguese and Latin American Studies; and Translation, including English-Chinese, English-Arabic and Localisation. We host three cross-disciplinary centres and several research projects and groups. We host two peer-reviewed journals.
